TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ProfileMigrateEventHandler(object sender, ProfileMigrateEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ProfileMigrateEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ProfileMigrateEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ProfileMigrateEventArgs)
public delegate void ProfileMigrateEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ProfileMigrateEventArgs ^ e);
type ProfileMigrateEventHandler = delegate of obj * ProfileMigrateEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表將處理 類別的 事件之方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義委派事件的類別。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 您可以存取事件的類別在您的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中，如本主題中範例所示。You can access the event of the class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application as shown in the example for this topic. 您可以使用事件，以複製設定檔屬性值從匿名設定檔的已驗證的設定檔已以匿名方式使用您的應用程式的任何人登入時。You can use the event to copy profile property values from an anonymous profile to an authenticated profile when someone who has been anonymously using your application logs in. 具有已啟用的使用者設定檔的應用程式啟動時，ASP.NET 會建立新類別的型別`ProfileCommon`，該項則繼承自類別。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 當`ProfileCommon`產生類別，根據在 Web.config 檔案中，指定的設定檔屬性`GetProfile`方法會加入可讓您擷取`ProfileCommon`物件會根據使用者名稱。When the `ProfileCommon` class is generated, based on the profile properties specified in the Web.config file, a `GetProfile` method is added that enables you to retrieve a `ProfileCommon` object based on a user name. 您可以使用`GetProfile`要擷取的屬性值的匿名的設定檔的目前設定檔的方法。You can use the `GetProfile` method of the current profile to retrieve the property values of the anonymous profile. 匿名的屬性值可以再複製到目前已驗證之使用者的設定檔。The anonymous property values can then be copied to the current profile for the authenticated user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 檔案，可讓匿名驗證和ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中所包含的事件。The following code examples show a Web.config file that enables anonymous authentication and the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 下列程式碼範例顯示 Web.config 檔案，可讓匿名識別和支援匿名使用者的設定檔屬性。The following code example shows a Web.config file that enables anonymous identification and profile properties that support anonymous users. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中所包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 事件將設定檔屬性值從匿名的設定檔複製到目前使用者的設定檔。The event copies profile property values from the anonymous profile to the profile for the current user. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/global.asax#1)]
